title: Offering To Deity: 20-year-old slits tongue as an offering to deity in Shahdol | Bhopal News - Times of India
text: BHOPAL: As an offering to a deity, a youth slit his tongue using a shaving blade in Shahdol district on Tuesday late afternoon.The incident took place at Siddh Baba temple in Chirhati village under Khairha police station.The youth, identified as Akash Sahu, 20, a resident of Chirhati village, was admitted to hospital and was undergoing treatment. Khairha police station in charge, Dileep Singh told TOI, “The youth frequently visited the temple to worship. On Tuesday as well, he was at the temple with his friends at around 1.30 pm. Later, he asked his friends to return home and told them that he had kept a fast and would stay at the temple.”“After his friends left, he attempted to slit his tongue. He managed to cut half of it before it started bleeding profusely. He also offered blood to the deity. After an hour, other people who had gone to visit the temple, spotted him. He told the locals that he had cut his tongue as an offering to the deity. The locals informed us, and we reached there,” Singh said.The parents of the youth had also reached the temple by the time police arrived. Sahu was taken to a govt hospital at Budhar, from where the doctors referred him to medical college in Shahdol. He is undergoing treatment and is stated to be out of danger, police said.
